name: Traffic Striker - Unstoppable Speed Racer & Rider Free Game
name_original: Traffic Striker - Unstoppable Speed Racer & Rider Free Game
description:
Motorbike Traffic Striker is a new concept in endless arcade racing games where you are here not to just cover miles but also enjoy striking the traffic on the way blowing away them from the roads and making your space. Drive with the unstoppable speed and smash the traffic coming on the highway. To strike the traffic you need to catch nitro power up, keep it with you and you are bike hero on the road.

BE THE DON OF THE ROAD

Driving on this highway road is not easy, especially when you are going with 200 mph unstoppable speed on a crowded road! Avoiding the cars is your only chance. Prove yourself to be a real rider, a racer. Get ready to enjoy Motorbike Traffic Racer game of the year.

- Ride your bike in the endless highway roads overtaking the traffic
- Have fun dodging cars and trucks while you speed up to the limit.
- Rich types of traffic including trucks, buses and SUVs.
- Endless highway road with traffic cars
- Unique Traffic Racing Race game of 2016
- Realistic traffic striking physics experience
- Unstoppable Speed driving experience
